main.description: Membership record stored in the member's Personal Data Server (PDS). Represents a user's membership in a specific community with associated role and status.

community.description: AT-URI of the community config record (at://did:plc:owner/com.atrarium.community.config/rkey)

active.description: Whether membership is currently active (false = left community)

invitedBy.description: DID of user who invited this member (optional)

customTitle.description: Custom role title displayed in community (optional)
